paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR V122I variant, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Carriers had a significantly higher number of LA abnormalities than non-carriers (1.8 ± 2.2 vs. 1.1 ± 1.6, P = 0.009).
27% vs. 12%; odds ratio 2.43; 95% confidence interval 1.06–5.58 after adjusting for age, sex, body mass index, and LV wall thickness and global LS.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with left atrial enlargement and dysfunction.

variants.additional_notes: The study suggests that abnormalities of LA function may represent early markers of subclinical disease in these individuals.
key_quotes: Left atrial enlargement and dysfunction were common in V122I TTR carriers with sinus rhythm than non-carriers.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted from the main text, with no additional tables available.
